query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `payments` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `invoiceId` int NOT NULL,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `paymentNumber` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `method` enum('bank_transfer', 'credit_card', 'debit_card', 'online_payment', 'cash', 'check') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed', 'refunded') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `amount` decimal(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  `currency` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SAR',
  `transactionId` varchar(255),
  `gatewayResponse` text,
  `paymentDate` timestamp,
  `receiptUrl` varchar(500),
  `receiptKey` varchar(500),
  `notes` text,
  `processedBy` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `invoice_idx` (`invoiceId`),
  INDEX `organization_idx` (`organizationId`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `payment_number_idx` (`paymentNumber`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2m1ctgqj5uashnj.root --database AS2yc6bjPtUHJmZyFBFARQ --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `payments` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `invoiceId` int NOT NULL,
  `organizationId` int NOT NULL,
  `paymentNumber` varchar(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  `method` enum('bank_transfer', 'credit_card', 'debit_card', 'online_payment', 'cash', 'check') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed', 'refunded') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `amount` decimal(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  `currency` varchar(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SAR',
  `transactionId` varchar(255),
  `gatewayResponse` text,
  `paymentDate` timestamp,
  `receiptUrl` varchar(500),
  `receiptKey` varchar(500),
  `notes` text,
  `processedBy` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `invoice_idx` (`invoiceId`),
  INDEX `organization_idx` (`organizationId`),
  INDEX `status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `payment_number_idx` (`paymentNumber`)
)
